The error itself basically means the API of the fglrx_dri.so library changed. i.e. the functions you can call on changed.
But the open-source software is still trying to call the old functions.
I do know that fglrx does not support aiglx
A quick google seems to indicate some forums where people with a similiar error message came for help: http://www.google.ca/search?hl=en&q=dlsym+for+__driCreateNewScreen_20050727+failed

Regardless, the error is pretty specialised (i.e. a specific driver version for a specific card in a specific setup) so it's unlikely someone here will be able to help you. We're more for general newbie questions. You can try, but your best bet is probably google.
